show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff and his guests discuss two major public health issues. <!--more--> First, investigative journalist Peter Byrne examines myths and realities about breast cancer, and how corporate “philanthropy” influences public discourse.
Next,  plaintiffs’ attorney Nate Mudd explains how asbestos-related diseases take thousands of lives each year in the US, yet asbestos remains in use.
Mudd also looks at pending legislation that could reduce compensation for victims of mesothelioma and other diseases caused by asbestos.
